title: Ticket #6554: Advanced Custom Machine Resource Tests
description:
Once we've finished implementing the tests for #6569 (which required implementing #6544 (which required completing #6543)), we should go ahead and finish the most gruelling possible tests. These tests would use the previously-verified monitor reporting multiple PEAK and multiple SUM metrics, but:

  • in a configuration with multiple resource instances per slot, and
  • in a configuration with multiple resource types, each of which have multiple instances per slot.
remarks:
2018-Feb-19 15:04:07 by tlmiller:
These configurations should also be tested for both static and dynamic slots.

2018-Mar-14 16:33:18 by tlmiller:
